featured.text: Now that we all use pencils, doodling is on the increase, and the quality of pencilwomanship is impressive, as you can tell from my handwriting in this letter.
There were, however, no 23 crew members to perform impressive stunts at that time.

definition.zh_def: 令人印象深刻的，令人讚嘆的
definition.en_def: Evoking admiration through size, quality, or skill.
definition.example: The magician's performance was truly impressive.
